duties_responsibilities.duty: Finalize job specifications and create requisitions for entry-level regular, full/part-time, and temporary positions.
Screen resumes/applications, interview candidates, and administer pre-employment tests.
Attend job fairs and visit local colleges to solicit applicants/provide information on the company.
Collaborate with hiring managers to review job descriptions, experience requirements, and sources for open positions.
Attract candidates using various sources, and present a compelling employment value proposition and realistic job preview.
Conduct legally compliant, behavior-based interviews, administer pre-employment tests, and coordinate interview schedules for successful candidates with hiring managers.
Advise hiring managers on starting salaries, extend offers of employment, and prepare/sent offer letters or letters indicating no interest.
Enter staffing-related information into HR systems, prepare periodic and ad hoc reports on staffing activities, and reconcile various invoices related to recruitment.
Keep abreast of and comply with company policies/procedures/guidelines/laws/regulations.

education_certification.credential: Minimum two-year college degree, Minimum of 2 years recruiting and sourcing experience, or related experience in a Human Resources department.

Knowledge of HR principals/practices/policies/systems and related laws/regulations/reporting requirements, recruiting/interviewing techniques, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and applicant tracking system.
Strong oral/written communication, interpersonal, presentation, mathematics skills, detail orientation, and the ability to interact effectively with all levels of management and staff.
